<h3 id="X21842">X(21842)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ISOGONAL CONJUGATE OF X(21398)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(2*a^3-(b+c)*a^2-(2*b^2-3*b*c+2*c^2)*a+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))  :  :


<p class="bold">
X(21842) = (R-2*r)*X(1)-2*r*X(3) = R*X(8)-2*(R-2*r)*X(214)</p>
<p>X(21842) lies on these lines:
{1,3}, {8,214}, {10,17566}, {48,1731}, {78,5288}, {79,2320}, {80,499}, {104,15071}, {140,10944}, {145,5442}, {191,5289}, {388,6902}, {497,5441}, {498,3476}, {515,6941}, {551,4311}, {579,17438}, {631,12647}, {943,15180}, {946,10483}, {952,5433}, {962,15228}, {997,5258}, {1125,3897}, {1149,4303}, {1317,5690}, {1387,6284}, {1476,15175}, {1478,3616}, {1479,5731}, {1698,17614}, {1737,5882}, {1770,13464}, {1836,4325}, {1837,3582}, {2975,5692}, {3065,11279}, {3086,6960}, {3296,5424}, {3485,4317}, {3486,10072}, {3523,5559}, {3583,11376}, {3584,3653}, {3585,5886}, {3624,10827}, {3632,5440}, {3636,4292}, {3730,17439}, {3813,10609}, {3877,5267}, {3878,11570}, {3884,4189}, {3899,3916}, {3911,13607}, {3918,17572}, {4299,5603}, {4315,13407}, {4316,12699}, {4324,12701}, {4511,5904}, {4857,11373}, {4861,4881}, {5251,19861}, {5270,11375}, {5280,9619}, {5303,5330}, {5541,10912}, {5687,15015}, {5693,6265}, {5694,17660}, {5730,6763}, {5901,7354}, {6907,10948}, {6932,10572}, {6934,11661}, {6963,10106}, {7272,17084}, {7288,7967}, {7356,12266}, {7677,18412}, {7705,20107}, {7727,11709}, {9613,17556}, {9897,18526}, {9955,18513}, {10039,10165}, {10090,11491}, {10525,12119}, {10597,11218}, {10950,15325}, {11363,17516}, {11571,19907}, {11720,19470}, {11735,18968}, {12943,18493}, {15950,18990}, {17221,17861}</p>
<p>
X(21842) = midpoint of X(1) and X(7280)<br>
X(21842) = isogonal conjugate of X(21398)<br>
X(21842) = X(7280)-of-anti-Aquila triangle<br>
X(21842) = X(16868)-of-2nd circumperp triangle<br>
X(21842) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 36, 5903), (1, 46, 11009), (1, 484, 1482), (1, 1420, 5563), (1, 3336, 2099), (1, 5131, 11280), (1, 11280, 10247), (1, 13462, 3338), (3, 1388, 1), (36, 11009, 46), (36, 14795, 3), (46, 11009, 5903), (1319, 1385, 1), (1482, 5204, 484), (5126, 15178, 65), (13462, 15932, 56)<br>
</p>
